1373660.name: Pandora: Chains of Chaos Artbook
1373660.description:
Dive on deep into the making of Pandora: Chains of Chaos with the Digital Artbook. In this book, it features concept art showing the evolution of Pandora, environments and even the story of Pandora. Starting from the first design, all the way to the final product.

The Pandora: Chains of Chaos Artbook contains pages filled with concept art of all the different characters, developer comments, key art, and so much more!
1373660.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
